amendment.description: An amendment numbered 26 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new paragraph, Offshore Exclusions, which shall not include oil and gas leasing in any tract located in the Central California planning area.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to add a new paragraph, Offshore Exclusions, which shall not include oil and gas leasing in any tract located in the Central California planning area.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Panetta amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 213 - 218 (Roll no. 48).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A021) offered by Mr. Panetta.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Panetta amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 213 - 218 (Roll no. 48).
